text:
.@realDonaldTrump 
Look at the 107,000 Americans who died because of your failed coronavirus response! And trying to take away healthcare in the midst of a PANDEMIC??
Look at the streets full of protesters! 
And you, using the US military like a weak wannabe dictator??
